t:
I loved playing Stone-Paper-Scissors during my childhood.
I didn't have any friends, so I'd sit in front of a mirror, playing
alone.

You can't comprehend my happiness when I won the game for the first time.
c:
What did/do you play in your alone time?


#childhood #play #stone_paper_scissor #mirror #reflection





*SPOILER*

Hint: I used to play Stone-Paper-Scissors with my reflection.
